temples.name: Santiago Chile Temple
temples.adress: Pocuro #1940 Providencia, 6641404 Santiago, Region Metropolitana (Santiago), Chile
temples.services: No clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: 2 April 1980 Announced, 30 May 1981 Groundbreaking, 15 September 1983 Dedicated — dedicatory prayer, 12 March 2006 Rededicated — dedicatory prayer
temples.ordinanceSchedule: All ordinances are available by appointment only.Proxy ordinances may be limited to members residing in their designated temple district.
temples.closureSchedule: Saturday, 21 May 2022, Monday, 1 August 2022 - Monday, 29 August 2022, Saturday, 17 September 2022, Saturday, 1 October 2022, Saturday, 24 December 2022, Saturday, 31 December 2022
